feed.title: MediaCMS Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for MediaCMS: v3.4.0
entry.content: This release is adding rounded corners on media https://github.com/mediacms-io/mediacms/pull/1067

entry.title: New release for MediaCMS: v3.5.0
entry.content: This release contains a fix where transcoding of videos failed in some cases - https://github.com/mediacms-io/mediacms/commit/ef4067cbdd1f1bc62c03ba78d17b91af42718e82

entry.title: New release for MediaCMS: v4.0.0
entry.content:
This version is adding one of the most wanted features: translations support!

Related PR: https://github.com/mediacms-io/mediacms/pull/1075

Other improvements include the addition of a Makefile and improvements in the documentation

entry.title: New release for MediaCMS: v4.1.0
entry.content: More strict input checing - https://github.com/mediacms-io/mediacms/pull/1089 Add Elestion as hosting provider - https://github.com/mediacms-io/mediacms/pull/1055
